Correction to: COVID arm that appeared in the contralateral upper extremity after mRNA‑1273 booster inoculation
Tomomi Sanomachi1 · Hitomi Sumiyoshi Okuma1 · Kan Yonemori1
Published online: 15 March 2023 © The Author(s) under exclusive licence to The Japan Society of Clinical Oncology 2023
Correction to: International Cancer Conference Journalhttps://doi.org/10.1007/s13691-023-00598-7
In the original publication Fig. 3 should be replaced with the one (Fig. 3) given in this correction.
The original publication has been corrected.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s13691- 023- 00598-7.
* Hitomi Sumiyoshi Okuma hsumiyos@ncc.go.jp
1 Department of Medical Oncology, Department of International Clinical Development, Clinical Research Support Office, National Cancer Center Hospital, 5-1-1 Tsukiji, Chuo-Ku, Tokyo, Japan
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

title: Correction to: COVID arm that appeared in the contralateral upper extremity after mRNA‐1273 booster inoculation
